availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Horatio Gates Valance Wintersmith (Hardin County merchant and attorney)

body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky merchant and attorney. Hardin County native. Married to Elmira Bland Wintersmith. Father of Maria J. Wintersmith, William H. Wintersmith, and Laura Wintersmith.

bibl.p:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, Elizabethtown District No. 1, p. 95;
Find A Grave, "Horatio Gates Valance Wintersmith (1828-1883)," Memorial #96422839, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=96422839 (accessed May, 23, 2017).
